record.description: Building at 57th Street and Kenwood Avenue (formerly Monroe Avenue) that housed the second Hyde Park High School from 1886 to 1893. It was razed in the 1940s and Bixler Playlot now occupies the site.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Negative on file.Attached to cardboard back, but it is beginning to peel away from its backing. University of Chicago Archives stamp.
